head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:generate-id()

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:generate-id()

body.p: This function returns a string that acts as a unique identifier for the supplied node. The identifier will always consist of ASCII letters and digits and will start with a letter.
The function is identical to the XSLT generate-id() function. It is provided as an extension function in the Saxon namespace to make it available in contexts other than XSLT, for example in XQuery.
